instructions.purpose: This file is placed in the folder of DNN skins/themes. It tells AccuTheme what mode its in and (in the future) sets other run-time environment settings.
instructions.scripted: To update the defaults, please use `npm run accutheme`
instructions.defaults: option1 is assumed to be the default and the original (copied in at project initialization) is in `src/AccuTheme-defaults.json`.
instructions.unCache: When false, normal DNN CRM. When true, the /Skin.css file is forcibly not cached on each page load with ?unc=NNNN (ticks).
